title: The New Superfood!
bodytext: The recently found folklore suggested that the villagers had discovered a new type of food so healthy that a single course a week would be sufficient

title: Eplerix: A website revamp
bodytext: After browsing tirelessly for several months, the king and his minions were delighted to have found Expleris.com

title: A Gaze Into the Abyss
bodytext: When first he arrived at the bay, he gazed out into the horizon with a strange, strange sensation of fear flowing through his vains.

title: League of God
bodytext: On the 7th day of the trip, Galio was not longer needed for his services. He strolled on into the chasm, only to find himself amidst a foul and unforgiving environment.
